name: Neptune Business
author: Mike Aggrey

sections.description:
Neptune Business is a unique multipurpose WordPress theme & plugin combo for small businesses & personal websites, it comes with a free theme that adds tons of features including, google maps, call to action & service boxes. Neptune lets you build simple websites for small businesess like digital agencies, consulting, construction, law firms, health care and many more industries. Take it for a spin today.

You can downlaod the free theme here

Demo

  • Basic (free) Demo
  • Agency (PRO) Demo
  • Portfolio (Pro) Demo

Click here to upgrade to Pro for just $59
sections.installation:
1. Install Neptune WP theme from wordpress.org under review
  2. Install Kirki and Advanced Custom Fields (free)
sections.faq:
Where can I get the Free theme from?

You can download the free theme here

What’s the difference between free & premium

With premium you get a dynamic page builder with 12 components built using ACF pro. You also get one click demo install, email support and plenty more features.
sections.changelog:
10/10/2018
– added one click demo import
– added upsell notification

short_description: Adds a custom homepage and custom metaboxes to be used with Neptune WP theme free on wordpress.org
